00051 template<class TESTEDCLASS> 
00052 class ClientConnectTest : public CPPUNIT_NS::TestFixture 
00053 {
00054 
00056   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE( ClientConnectTest );
00057 
00063   CPPUNIT_TEST( testStartup );
00064 
00070   CPPUNIT_TEST( testInexistant );
00071 
00077   CPPUNIT_TEST( addAccount );
00078 
00084   CPPUNIT_TEST( testEmail );
00085 
00091   CPPUNIT_TEST( testWrongPassword );
00092 
00098   CPPUNIT_TEST( testBlacklist );
00099 
00105   CPPUNIT_TEST( testSuccess );
00106 
00112   CPPUNIT_TEST( delAccount );
00113 
00115   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();

00117 protected:
00121   TESTEDCLASS   *m_testedClass;
00122   
00123 public:
00129   int countTestCases(){
00130     return 1;
00131   }
00132 
00136   void setUp(){ 
00137     this->m_testedClass = new TESTEDCLASS; 
00138   }
00139   
00143   void tearDown(){ 
00144     delete this->m_testedClass; 
00145   }
00146 
00153   void testInexistant(){
00154     tClientConnectReturn ret=this->m_testedClass->connect(CLIENT_NAME, "");
00155     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( ret==CCR_INEXISTANT_USER );
00156 
00157     if (ret!=CCR_INEXISTANT_USER){
00158       cout << "return is :"<< returnToString(ret) << endl;
00159     }
00160   }
00161 
00167   void testStartup(){
00168     tClientConnectReturn ret=this->m_testedClass->getResponse();
00169     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( ret==CCR_UNKNOWN_ERROR );
00170   }
00171 
00177   void addAccount(){
00178     CurlAccountAdd cpa;
00179     cpa.setName( CLIENT_NAME );
00180     cpa.setPassword( CLIENT_PWD );
00181     cpa.setMail( CLIENT_MAIL );
00182     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( cpa.perform() );
00183 
00184   }
00185 
00189   void delAccount(){
00190     CurlAccountDelete cpd;
00191     cpd.setName( CLIENT_NAME );
00192     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( cpd.perform() );
00193 
00194   }
00195 
00208   void testEmail(){
00209 
00210     tClientConnectReturn ret=this->m_testedClass
00211       ->connect(CLIENT_NAME, CLIENT_WRONG_PWD);
00212     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( ret==CCR_EMAIL_NOT_VALIDATED );
00213 
00214     CurlAccountConfirmMail cacm;
00215     cacm.setName(CLIENT_NAME);
00216     bool performConfirmMail=cacm.perform();
00217     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( performConfirmMail );
00218   }
00219 
00227   void testWrongPassword(){
00228 
00229     tClientConnectReturn ret=this->m_testedClass
00230       ->connect(CLIENT_NAME, CLIENT_WRONG_PWD);
00231     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( ret==CCR_WRONG_PWD );
00232 
00233     if (ret!=CCR_WRONG_PWD){
00234       cout << "return is :"<< returnToString(ret) << endl;
00235     }
00236 
00237     // We set this account on blacklist
00238     CurlAccountToggleBlacklist catb;
00239     catb.setName(CLIENT_NAME);
00240     bool performToggleBlacklist=catb.perform();
00241     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( performToggleBlacklist );
00242 
00243   }
00244 
00251   void testBlacklist(){
00252     tClientConnectReturn ret=this->m_testedClass
00253       ->connect(CLIENT_NAME, CLIENT_PWD);
00254     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( ret==CCR_BLACKLIST );
00255 
00256     if (ret!=CCR_BLACKLIST){
00257       cout << "return is :"<< returnToString(ret) << endl;
00258     }
00259 
00260     // We set this account off blacklist
00261     CurlAccountToggleBlacklist catb;
00262     catb.setName(CLIENT_NAME);
00263     bool performToggleBlacklist=catb.perform();
00264     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( performToggleBlacklist );
00265 
00266   }
00267 
00271   void testSuccess(){
00272     tClientConnectReturn ret=this->m_testedClass
00273       ->connect(CLIENT_NAME, CLIENT_PWD);
00274     CPPUNIT_ASSERT( ret==CCR_SUCCESS );
00275 
00276   }
00284   std::string returnToString(tClientConnectReturn ret){
00285     std::string s;
00286     switch(ret){
00287     case CCR_INEXISTANT_USER:
00288       s="CCR_INEXISTANT_USER";
00289       break;
00290 
00291     case CCR_UNKNOWN_ERROR :
00292       s="CCR_UNKNOWN_ERROR";
00293       break;
00294 
00295     case CCR_WRONG_PWD:
00296       s="CCR_WRONG_PWD";
00297       break;
00298 
00299     case CCR_EMAIL_NOT_VALIDATED:
00300       s="CCR_EMAIL_NOT_VALIDATED";
00301       break;
00302 
00303     case CCR_BLACKLIST:
00304       s="CCR_BLACKLIST";
00305       break;
00306 
00307     case CCR_SUCCESS:
00308       s="CCR_SUCCESS";
00309       break;
00310 
00311     }
00312     return s;
00313   }
00314 
00315 };
